CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Tech_Stage__c , "Technical Discovery") , TODAY() - Went_to_Technical_Discovery_Date__c , IF(ISPICKVAL( Tech_Stage__c , "Trial Management") , TODAY() - Went_to_Trial_Management_Date__c , IF(ISPICKVAL( Tech_Stage__c , "Technical Proposal") , TODAY() - Went_to_Technical_Proposal_Date__c , IF(ISPICKVAL( Tech_Stage__c , "New Key Account Identified") , TODAY() - Went_to_New_Key_Account_Identified_Date__c ,NULL ))))
CustomField.label: Current Tech Stage Duration
